overview: Doug Niles discovers what detective work is all about when he goes undercover and discovers that superstud Tom Steele is packing more than a pistol. Seeing is believing; when you see super-hung Rick Stryker is even more massively hung than his real-life brother Jeff Stryker. From rooftop to street light, it's non-stop hot action with the hottest men from John Travis.
title: Undercover
